import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button, Table } from 'react-bootstrap'; class Attendance extends Component { constructor (props) { super(props); this.state = { }; this.onChangeSelect = this.onChangeSelect.bind(this); this.onChangeCheck = this.onChangeCheck.bind(this); this.onClickMail = this.onClickMail.bind(this); } onChangeSelect (e) { this.setState ({ year: e.target.value }); } onChangeCheck (e) { if (e.target.checked) { document.getElementById("atd").className = "form-inline"; }else{ document.getElementById("atd").className = "form-inline d-none"; } } onClickMail () { } render () { return (
